message: Just soft-launched AppDiem.com. AppDiem is a daily mobile app deal site showcasing free or discounted apps on Android, iPhone, iPad or (in the future) Blackberry and WebOS. Simply put, it's a "Woot" for mobile apps (or maybe Groupon).
If you're feeling extra generous,  please upvote on HN: http://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=2332100
So how do apps reduce their prices just for you versus everyone? Or do they just lower their price and you notify customers?

We're working with a number of mobile app developers (on a number of platforms) who are willing to run sales through our site.  In addition to that, we're happy to promote apps that are free.  In some cases, they may use promo codes that AppDiem will provide, and in other cases, they may just run a one-day sale that we announce.
